title: Blood Brotha
overview: A Philadelphia stick-up boy lives life on the edge with no regard until he meets the one girl who wins his heart. Ready to trade his criminal life style for love, he first has to deal with enemies from his past who wants him dead.

title: Axiomatic
overview: In the near future – nanotechnology exists that can alter your beliefs for a predetermined period of time. Marissa Carver, a non-violent pacifist seeks to avenge the death of her wife by using an Axiomatic device that suspends her moral convictions allowing her to exact revenge on her wife’s killer.

title: Scorpion: Vice City Shakedown
overview: A lone wolf police officer hunts his city's newest drug lord and its corrupt mayor by any means necessary.
tagline: Born to shoot bad guys in the face.

title: Pirmieji kovotojai su mafija
overview: Documentary movie by Dailius Dargis about 6th criminal police unit in Lithuania, who were the first ones to fight against Lithuanian mafia in the early 90s.

title: Ballad of the Nail
overview: The story of a killer, nicknamed 'nail driver', in the twilight of his career, who decides to protect an outcast with a price on his head for trying to run off with boss gangster's daughter.

title: Hostility
overview: Two overweight brothers get into a fight over a cookie that ends in blood.

title: Dunblane: Our Story
overview: On 13 March 1996, a gunman walked into a primary school in the small Scottish town of Dunblane near Stirling, and shot dead 16 pupils and their teacher in a Primary 1 gym class. To date, it is one of the deadliest firearms atrocities in the UK. In a landmark film to commemorate the 20th anniversary of the tragedy, 'Dunblane: Our Story' interviews many people who have never before talked publicly about what happened on that day.

title: Whitefolks
overview: The fears and consequences of the con life are explored when Two Con-Artist from the Southside of Chicago Hustle the Russian Mafia. Their street skills are put to the test when they are given 14 days to pay 2 Million dollars in restitution.

title: Geheime Geschäfte - Ein neuer Krimi ohne Leiche
Committed
overview: Casey is a man who kills people for a living. What toll will it take on his marriage and how far will he go to keep his secret?
tagline: The closer you look, the less you see.

title: R Kelly: Sex, Girls and Videotapes
overview: Benjamin Zand investigates the bizarre and disturbing allegations surrounding the sex life of the U.S. R&B star, including accusations of holding women against their will at his home in Atlanta and running a degrading 'sex cult'.

title: Cain's Shadow
overview: November 5th, 2025. Western metropolis. Young inspector Abel is grappling with the umpteenth disappearance: Angela, a 9-year-old girl, of whom there has been no news for two days.

title: The Auction
overview: Ava's sister goes missing after they have an argument. Ava must fight her ADHD to find her sister with the help of an old school friend.

title: I Am Coming To Paris To Kill You
overview: A woman hijacks a family trip in pursuit of a deceitful kidnapper.

title: Never Forgiven
overview: Detective Sargent Matthews investigates the tragic death of a young boy and makes us question whether anyone should ever be forgiven.
tagline: Can you ever truly forgive?

title: Conviction: The Jill Meagher Story
overview: This crime documentary focuses on the homicide detectives who investigated the emotional, high-profile case of a murdered Melbourne woman in 2012.

title: Agli baar
overview: When a group of slum dwellers objects to the illegal demolition of their shanties, a killer is set loose to silence their protest by perpetrating ruthless murders.

title: Concrete Feet
overview: A mob enforcer is betrayed and transformed into a bonafide killing machine.

title: Devil's Deal
overview: Two DEA agents intercept a drug deal only to find out that one is working on the other side.  Director Austin Behl Writers Austin Behl(story)Lisa Whalen Hoffmann(story) Stars Austin BehlLisa Whalen Hoffmann

title: Nyrs Smith
overview: Anna tries to steal a Kyffin Williams painting from her old school. She is caught by the caretaker, who recognises her immediately - not as a former pupil, but as 'Nurse Smith'.

title: The Dialogue
overview: After a disastrous event in the past, Henry and Adam meet each other again. This meeting is about to escalate.
tagline: Henry, tell me the truth!

title: Glorious
overview: The compelling story of a young man's journey from rage and gang violence to the unusual gift that God would use to turn his life around.

title: Bishupal Bodh
overview: Detective Byomkesh and sidekick Awjeet, on the request of Dr. Rakshit, meets Bishupal, a moneylender whose life is under threat from Awbhoy Ghoshal. However, Ghoshal is found dead in a twist of events.

title: Mop
overview: A night cleaner accidentally kills an office worker, he must hide the body without being seen.

title: Jannat
overview: A rural couple face problems in their relationship when the man's demeanour changes and he gets involved in criminal activity.

title: Chaco
overview: "There was a time when carob trees were our founthead of life. When you could serenely see rabbits, armadillos and many other species. The night that the white man appeared the black eagle warned us: 'Danger, Danger'

title: Homecoming
overview: The peaceful existence of former career criminals is shattered by a midnight phone call to one of them, made by a former associate believed to be dead. Turns out he’s back — and out for blood.

title: Bishop
overview: The documentary tells the harrowing true story of William Bradford Bishop Jr., who in 1976 murdered his entire family in Bethesda, MD, and then vanished, never to be seen again. Was Bishop secretly working for the CIA, as a State Department co-worker surmised on the Today Show? Were the slayings premeditated, with others involved? Or was this a case of a seemingly successful man in a picture-perfect marriage who simply cracked one day? Has Bishop adopted a new identity in a foreign land? Or is he living off the grid somewhere in the States?

title: I Owe You
overview: Father-to-be Cam owes his perfect life to his estranged friend Todd. But when Todd shows up one night with a body in his trunk and calls in the debt, Cam must choose between an awful trip into darkness and having his own terrible secret revealed.

title: Operation Popcorn
overview: During the Vietnam War, the CIA recruited Hmong tribesmen in the hills of Laos to fight the Communists, then brought them as refugees to America. Forty years later in California, someone who might be a CIA operative approaches a Hmong human rights activist about buying weapons to continue the fight.

title: Dreadhawk
overview: A masked vigilante fights crime in the troubled city of Hampton while local police struggle to uncover his identity and motive.

title: Red Hood
overview: The Red Hood lays down the law on Gotham gangsters in this short film.

title: Blitz
overview: Corporal Rosinha is accused of killing a boy during a police roundup in a local high school and the population is outraged. Rosinha's wife, Heloísa of the bakery, tries to find out the truth about what happened.

title: A Dirty Cop
overview: The dirty cop begins with Inspector Relander's cold-blooded murder, which is investigated by the police duo Raittinen (Raunio) and Jokinen (Kulmala). Jack (Tuiskinen), a hard-core member of the Teisko mafia, is also involved in the murder. Behind the assignment is the mysterious Mr. Rönkvist. Is Rönkvist ultimately a man or a myth?

title: Aaj Amar Pala
overview: Film data is unknown at this point

title: Deliverance
overview: An organized crime member gets mixed up with a Catholic priest while trying to complete a job for his boss.

title: Werewolf Ninja Philosopher
overview: Someone is killing art house filmmakers in NYC so the city calls on Werewolf Ninja Philosopher - a werewolf who is a ninja, a philosopher, and a private detective - to help stop the killings.

title: The Raid
overview: Four special operation FBI agents go on a mission to take down a terrorist organization.
tagline: Mission is a go.

title: Camera
overview: The story of two friends, Majid and Hamed who involves in a police case.

title: The Wrong People
overview: Greg is a desperate man. Presented with an opportunity that is hard to resist. He will have to choose between old heroes, new enemies, and family.

title: LCD
overview: Miguel is a movie buff who is dedicated to filming Paula, a classmate with whom he is in love. Maria, his sister, is his great confidant. Both will exchange secrets that will change Miguel's life.
tagline: Miguel is a movie buff who is dedicated to filming Paula, a classmate with whom he is in love. Maria, his sister, is his great confidant. Both will exchange secrets that will change Miguel's life.

title: L-38
overview: L 38 known as Laurentino 38, tells the story of four criminals: the Chechen, the Jesus, Rug and Pimp, that shoot snuff movies for their boss "Sergio il Pappa". When the Chechen receives the visit of the a mysterious man the level of blood and violence rises.

title: Aicha
overview: Martin celebrates his fourteenth birthday with his shoeshine friends. Between superstitions and a land that comes to life, their bodies will only be flesh under a few light flashes.

title: Doblez
overview: Guilherme is tormented by the possibility of his fiancée being cheating on him. Desperate to end this mystery, he plans out a terrible way to finding the truth.
tagline: ADMIT!

title: Enter The Spaghetti
overview: An absurdist satire following Rombolio, an angry Italian assassin, who avenges his mother by attempting to kill her murderer Bertolli.
tagline: This summer... never bring a knife to a katana fight...

title: The Game Is Dirty
overview: Two Vigilant best-friends go on a spree of robberies to maintain their lifestyles. Its a small world, as their lesson is to keep their enemies closer.

title: Foreign
overview: In a society full of mistrust of foreign people, a Swiss lawyer with Arabic roots becomes a victim of prejudice towards the Arab culture.

title: Consanguine
overview: a man has killed another man because of something his brother said
tagline: brotherhood is something you can't escape

title: Calling
overview: This film tells the story of a middle-aged real estate tycoon - Jianguo Wang - suffering from a dual personality disorder exacerbated by extreme work and private life pressures. One day, he receives a call from a stranger. The stranger is able to mysteriously control Wang's car door from a distance. If Wang has a hope of opening the door, he must obey the stranger's increasingly bizarre orders. Based on the stranger's puzzling clues, Wang sees himself divorced from his beautiful but demanding wife Min, his lover Ling-Ling is murdered by a man donning a black coat in a hotel suite, and Wang's Real Estate empire collapses around him. In tantalizing morsels, the stranger continues to reveal the things Wang has done in the past. Finally, the stranger gives him a pill and Wang falls into a coma. After several minutes, in a darkened room the mobile rings again. Wang is standing in an unlit room with a menacing grin - dialing himself .

title: Brandon Rising
overview: Brandon Rising is rising up the ranks of boxing, but to become the number 1 boxer, he must defeat the evil Beelzebubba.
tagline: Brandon Rising rises again

title: Murderous Minds: Fred & Rose West
overview: A look inside the minds of Britains evilest couple...

title: Il Bluff
overview: A poker game will prove fatal...
tagline: A poker game will prove fatal...

title: Ciudad de Caos: Día Duro
overview: After a hard day at work, an unscrupulous lawyer drinks and chats in a bar. While investigating a noise, he is ambushed by a person whom he caused terrible harm in the past who will punish him for his crimes in a cruel act of justice.

title: Khonjin House: The Movie
overview: Follows the globe-trotting adventures of mob members Khonjin, Gino, and Gay Spaghetti Chef.
tagline: HAVE YOU'RE hUSBAND EVER MADE LOVE?

title: Bohurupi
overview: A boy named Siam Mehraf was cheated by his friend Ove. Becasue Ove has taken his lover by cheating on him. And there was a lot of quarrel between them about that. At one point Ove and some other people decided to kill Siam. What will he do? Will he die or survive? Will he take revenge on the wrong done to him? It is a story of a mixture of friendship, love and revenge.
tagline: Everyone Is A Villain

title: A Soap Opera
overview: Two teenage boys invest in making illegal soap until things go south and chaos wreaks havoc.
tagline: THE CRIMINALISATION OF SOAP IS A COMPLICATED THING

title: Passage
overview: A short crime thriller about the young crook Rick who receives an apparent simple task from his boss that changes into a grim test of his loyalty.

title: Drowsy City
overview: Slaughtering chickens for a living, Tao spends most of his time in close proximity with the birds which seem to be the only companions to his solitude. Until one day three strange gangsters come to hide in the abandoned building where he is living in, bringing violence, noisy drunkenness, bullying and a young prostitute. Turning for the worst, the situation will precipitate into a spiral of muted love and cruel torture to an utterly unpredictable outcome.

title: Spring Follows Winter
overview: An elderly man living in a poor rural village comes across a bag full of cash on the street. He returns the bag to its owner but soon realizes that he’d given the bag to the wrong person.

title: Quick'n'Clean
overview: Ria is a young girl working at a dry cleaner's. Not much to expect here, apart from the fact that she's expecting. It's ten minutes before the shop closes, when her boyfriend Lenny steps in to hide a mysterious suitcase. He's looking for a safe harbour while she makes a quick and clean decision.

title: Robber's Company
overview: The stage is Tokyo. One girl wants to be a fashion designer. She gets a job officially selling suits, but main business is robbing banks. Her name is Funny. Is Funny able to follow her dream be a fashion designer even though she might get caught in the factions and bonds of the company?!
tagline: I got a job with a robber's company

title: Mr. Bangladesh
overview: With terrorism rising, one man fights back even if it costs him everything.

title: Honour
overview: Lee and Sonny are very close 11-year-old friends who are goaded by an older boy to break into a flat they think is uninhabited as an initiation to join his 'crew'. Their mission is to bring back something of value but what they find instead is an inert, probably dead, man inside. Lee and Sonny are forced to confront their naive notions of masculinity and codes of honour when the dead man turns out to be a wanted criminal in hiding.

title: Stone Cold
overview: When Private Eye Humphrey Stone's brother is murdered in 1940's San Francisco, it's his job to figure out who did it, no matter the cost.
tagline: You Stone?

title: Slicer
overview: A man that dismembers bodies finds his life in danger when one of the corpses isn't really dead.

title: Let's Kill Mom
overview: Two estranged siblings (Logan Ward and Madison Laird) reunite as adults to plot the murder of their antagonistic mother (Jody Ryan) in hopes of getting a hold of a large inheritance. Along the way, they find themselves in over their heads as their simple plan has unforeseen consequences. Hilarity (and carnage) ensue in this dark comedy full of colorful characters.
tagline: Some children have their mother's eyes....they just want her money.

title: Marked For Trade
overview: The untimely death of a young woman sparks interest in (Stella Martin) a flamboyant lawyer with a mysterious past.

title: The Incident on Purple Finch Road
overview: A girl finally gets the chance to get out of her abusive relationship. One night while her boyfriend is away, she takes it.

title: Blind Mice
overview: A con within a con.

title: Bread
overview: In an alternate food-themed reality, the brash Detective Alfredo crosses former friends and enemies in an attempt to retrieve a stolen heirloom, The Bread, over the course of one chaotic night.
tagline: Cleanup on Aisle 5

title: Dark Glasses at Night
overview: Neo-Noir film about a man and a woman.

title: The Mexican Cartel
overview: Can you imagine being between life and death? This is what young students go through after being ambushed by a Mexican gang.
tagline: This story begins when two friends arrive at his house...

title: A Study in Mary
overview: Detective partner, Mary, disguises as a man in her role until she accidentally murders in self-defence. Will the detective uncover the truth?
tagline: Not is all that it seems

title: Greenbeaks
overview: After a failed attempt to retrieve money that they owe to the mafia, the only thing that can save the lives of four friends is their luck.
tagline: Sometimes the job is done for you.

title: Dirty World
overview: Бохир ертөнц (Dirty World) is a mongolian crime movie released in 2015.
tagline: Бохир ертөнц МУСК

title: Broken Flowers
overview: Mother sent Doer, who was in the fourth grade, to learn the violin, but the teacher made some strange behaviors to her during the learning process, so Doer had a secret that cannot be told.
tagline: An indescribable day of a 10-year-old Chinese girl called Duo Er.

title: 12th Floor
overview: When a wheelchair-bound woman moves back in with her disabled mother, she finds that much more goes on in the independent living apartment complex than she could possibly imagine.

title: Luana
overview: Luana plays between trains and swings while she waits for her father on the other side of the line.

title: Deathrattle
overview: A man brings a dead body to a fixer's house.
tagline: This is Business.

title: Halt: The Motion Picture
overview: A black couple is pulled over by police when a simple traffic stop becomes a nightmare they will never forget.
tagline: Halt: The Motion Picture

title: White Noise
overview: Two men kidnap a girl, then kill her, later realising it is a bad idea. One of the men goes mad until realising there is no way he can get out of the mess.
tagline: The end of it all

title: Toast
overview: Phil tries his hand as a hired thug, but a miscommunication places him in the crosshairs of his employers.

title: Withdrawal
overview: 2 co-workers Joke about robbing a bank until one actually does it and coerces the other as his accomplice.
tagline: Choose your friends wisely.

title: Hey Monster, Hands Off My City
overview: This Fellini-inspired Comedy Film directed by Michael Meehan, features a large comic cast, and stars SF Comedians Johnny Steele and Reggie Steele as SFPD homicide detectives, who find half eaten bodies turning up all over San Francisco.

title: Taylor & Barinov
overview: Two 70's cops are assigned to a new police programme solving the crimes of subpar cases.
tagline: They're cleaning up... the streets.
